strings.Value: "I'm fairly certain that the old man who helped us to destroy the Flower knew something of the gnomes' migration from the First World. I still can't believe he refused to give me any answers!"
"We visited another world, learned an unbelievable secret, won an unprecedented victory and brought peace to our lands. Yet still all you care about is gnomes! Gnomes! Gnomes! Gnomes!"
"You've seen people torn apart by monsters, from the inside out â€” and your reaction is to wallow in self-pity?!"
"Searching for knowledge is as vain and futile as accumulating worldly goods."
